name: Roots of Power
description:
POST-JAM VERSION: RHIZA OMEGA

WASD to move. Right click to root / unroot on the grid.
You can't move while rooted.
Left click to shoot - you can only shoot while rooted.
When placing tiles, left click to place.
Roots will give you the effect of the tile that they spread to.

As a preformed team of one in Global Game Jam Malaysia, I was given an additional challenge - to get my game idea from ChatGPT. Here's what I got:

"Roots of Power" - a fast-paced action game where players take on the role of a powerful warrior who must defend their homeland from an invading army. The player is equipped with a magic weapon that is rooted in the earth, and the player's power increases as they collect the roots of ancient trees scattered throughout the game world. The player must battle against the enemy army, using their weapon and magic abilities to defeat the enemies and protect their home. The game features a variety of weapons and magic abilities, each with unique strengths and weaknesses, and players can choose the path they take through the game world. The game can be played solo or with friends in a cooperative multiplayer mode. The game features vibrant, fast-paced action and a thrilling storyline that will keep players engaged from beginning to end.
